name: Death Row (Freezex)
description:
**Made in 24 hours for the Minijam 72: Adventure**

The witches! They are trying to create an immortality spell. 

You (The Grim Reaper) must stop them or you will cease to exist.  Steal their souls and make sure they can't finish their spell!

Controls: 
Attack - Left Mouse Button
Move - WASD
Dash - Space
Invisibility - Right Mouse Button
